name: Spider Life Simulator 3D
description:
Start your own wild adventure in this realistic micro world with Spider Life Simulator 3D! Show who is the best poisonous net-spinner here!
Check our Spider Life Simulator 3D – game for all the animals simulator lovers! Become a pretty wild insect — large Wolf spider! Explore woods, plains, and hills and enjoy the beautiful micro world around!
Run across the plains and forests, fight against predators -
aggressive wasps, rhino bugs and butterflies - harvest nectar, and give it to the large female spider – your only potential mate! Enjoy the life of a real arthropod in Spider Life Simulator 3D! Take this challenge and have fun!
How to survive? It’s quite simple, you need search for food, run across plains and forests, struggle with other predators, harvest honey, protect your nest and feed your old father!
Be careful - aggressive insects, such as bees, beetles, other spiders or butterflies are nearby you. Don’t forget to check your spider health, energy, water and food indicators to survive!
Spider Life Simulator 3D features:
Cunning wolf spider as the main character
Chance to live an insect life
Huge wilderness full of dangerous predators
Different ways to update your spider
Beautiful 3d graphics
